I will be recording the very very sad step by step process in trying to 
re=
store SHQ.  Not everything on the old site will be back online because 
we =
are trying to keep things simple.  If you recall our old hosting 
company w=
as unable to restore the one html file which housed the 
entire site---that=
's why SHQ died.

Anyways some of the gory details.

Put in 4 hours and jus=
t came up with a list of things:
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/37668=
.html

The evolution of SHQ over the past 4 years was
simple html > html wi=
th frames > html with no frames but everything 
looked much better and orga=
nized > content management system (I 
was happy until the obliteration of t=
he critical file) > Wordpress (present 
state)

each evolution was not simp=
ly "cut and paste" code either...it's all hand 
done page by page (*_*)

Th=
e difficulty lies in the fact that SHQ had tons of text and some pages 
wit=
h text and images and some pages with just images.  As someone 
with absolu=
tely no tech background prior to working on this--- all this 
has been a re=
al pain for me over the years as I split time between 
research and then tr=
ying to figure out how to put it all online.

Sneak Peak: http://shinsengum=
ihq.com/shq/
I practiced working with Wordpress on other blogs recently and=
 
everything is cool...until I messed with this particular template.
